categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: M'nevvus Leep was a male Bith. During the Galactic Civil War, Leep singlehandedly recruited three planets to the cause of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Although the Galactic Empire declared him dead eight times, the Bith kept coming back.
Several months into the Imperial blockade of the Anoat sector, Leep joined the crew of a young smuggler from Burnin Konn, assisting them on various missions throughout the sector.
